tailor.name: Tailor
s: You made a lovely dress for an elderly lady and earned {AMT} coins.
You altered a suit for a businessman and earned {AMT} coins.
You made a snazzy suit for a wealthy guy and earned yourself {AMT}.
f: You tried to sew a shirt, but ended up with a mess of tangled thread.
You ruined a dress while trying to sew on a button.
You tried making the magic suit Regular Show, then remembered... you're a tailor, not a scientist.

s: You harvested a bumper crop of wheat and earned {AMT} coins.
You sold fresh milk from your dairy farm and earned {AMT} coins.
The rain brought you got produce which earned you {AMT} coins.
f: You lost a valuable herd of cattle to disease.
A hailstorm destroyed your fields, leaving you with no harvest to sell.
You went to go harvest your crops, and noticed your farm a desert now, lmao.

s: You won a tournament and earned {AMT} coins.
You sold a rare item for a high price and earned {AMT} coins.

f: You lost all your progress in a game due to a bug.
You got scammed by someone promising to sell you in-game currency.
You were planning on making a Tarreria series, but some unnamed flying monster one shot you.

You got a brand deal for your channel and earned {AMT} coins.
You cracked 1M views, racking in {AMT} coins from ad revenue
f: Your channel got demonetized for violating community guidelines.
Your latest video got a lot of dislikes and negative comments.
You said a bad word in the first 30 seconds of your video. No money for you :-1:

s: You got a lot of donations during your last stream and earned {AMT} coins.
You got a sponsor for your channel and earned {AMT} coins.
f: Your internet went out during a stream, causing you to lose viewers and potential income.

s: You successfully handled a sensitive situation and earned {AMT}.
You helped a new user navigate the server and earned {AMT}.
f: You accidentally deleted a channel and had to spend time restoring it.
You had to deal with a toxic user and it took up a lot of your time and energy.

teacher.name: Teacher
s: You helped a struggling student improve their grades and earned {AMT}.
You received excellent feedback from students and earned {AMT}.
f: You had to spend extra time grading a difficult assignment.
You had to deal with a disruptive student and it took up a lot of your time and energy.

chef.name: Chef
s: You created a new dish that was a hit with customers and earned {AMT}.
You received a great review from a food critic and earned {AMT}.
f: You burned a dish and had to remake it, costing you extra time and resources.
You had to deal with a difficult customer and it took up a lot of your time and energy.

pilot.name: Pilot
s: You flew a successful flight and earned {AMT}.
You received positive feedback from passengers and earned {AMT}.
f: You experienced turbulence and had to spend extra time trying to stabilize the plane.
You had to deal with an unruly passenger and it took up a lot of your time and energy.

servant.name: Servant
s: You completed all your tasks efficiently and earned {AMT}.
You received a bonus from your employer for your excellent work and earned {AMT}.
f: You accidentally broke a valuable item and had to pay for it out of your own pocket.

police.name: Police
s: You caught a robber and received {AMT} as a reward from the grateful shop owner.
You solved a difficult case and received {AMT} as a bonus from your superiors.
f: You couldn't catch the criminal and got reprimanded by your boss.
You let a criminal get away and received a warning from your superiors.

miner.name: Miner
s: You found a rare mineral and sold it for {AMT} to a wealthy collector.
You worked overtime and received {AMT} in extra pay from your boss.
f: You accidentally caused a cave-in and had to pay {AMT} for the damages.
You got lost in the mine and had to be rescued, but received no pay for that day.

construction-worker.name: Construction Worker
s: You finished the project ahead of schedule and received {AMT} as a bonus from your boss.
You found a lost wallet on the construction site and returned it to its owner, who gave you {AMT} as a reward.
f: You damaged some expensive equipment and had to pay {AMT} for the repairs.
You got into a fight with a coworker and got suspended for a week without pay.
